name: Kachingle
tag_list: freemium, premium, micropayment, micropayments, micro-payment, micro-payments, bundle, bundling, social-media, crowd-funding, crowdsourcing
overview:
Kachingle is a robust usage-based micropayment platform that is capable of collecting and distributing monies in a myriad of different ways.

Kachingle Premium is the bundling of various vendors’ PC/MAC/SaaS/Web premium apps and offering all of them together at one very low, irresistible price. This fits in nicely with freemium vendors’ offerings and bridges the “first penny gap” that all vendors experience. Payments to vendors are based upon user visits, plus the number of users they sign up into the growing user pool. And users benefit from the simplicity of a single sign up, one monthly payment, and full use of the premium apps….all for a fraction of their retail price.

Kachingle Anything is a proven monetary distribution service that allows web content providers a new and reliable revenue stream. Subscribers make five dollar voluntary contributions that are distributed to content providers based upon traffic to content. The model takes full advantage of the web’s social networking and crowdfunding possibilities.
